# Before you start

To save time at the actual workshop, the following steps should ideally be completed beforehand.

  1. Install the Particle CLI (Command Line Interface)
  2. Create a Particle account if you do not already have one.
  3. Install the Particle iOS or Android App.

All done? Now you are ready to dive in to the workshop ğŸš€
